Package cz.cvut.fel.omo.semestral.entity.devices.appliances

Class TV

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.omo.semestral.entity.devices.appliances.Appliance
cz.cvut.fel.omo.semestral.entity.devices.appliances.TV
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDevice, IDeviceCommand, Tickable
public class TV extends Appliance
Represents a Television (TV) in the smart home system. This class provides functionalities for turning the TV on and off, adjusting volume, and changing channels. The state of the TV (on or off), current volume level, and channel are managed through specific commands. The TV starts with a default channel and volume level, and its operational status is indicated by its state within the smart home environment.
